meanings.definition: Resembling a shrub in appearance or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The small, shrublike plant added a touch of green to the garden.
meanings.sent2: The bushes in the park were shrublike, with their dense foliage.
meanings.sent3: The shrublike tree seemed to be playing hide-and-seek with the other plants.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, wild and shrublike, framed her face in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The shrublike bushes whispered secrets to the wind, their leaves rustling softly.
